page.title: 20CONCLUSIONS
page.content: The story of Northampton's expansion is by no means complete.There is much more to come in the way of change in both the urban landscape & social attitudes. The technological changes too are already affecting local people.A pilot scheme now operating here enables folk to shop without cash as businesses are installing computer terminals in co-op eration with the Anglia Building Societ y using a plastic card.This is the first town to operate this system.***** ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS:Many thanks are due to the following for their contributions:- Susan Anderson,Wendy Collins,Gordon Crawford,Lee Cronk,Nicola Forbes,Jalal Khan,Sally McQuade,Rachael Packer,Matth ew Summers,Simon Towle,Donna Turnbull, and Nicola Williams. Michael Symes (co-ordinator & editor) *************************************** **************************************
